name: Pixel Jar
description:
Pixel Jar offers a wide range of custom web development services to help you provide a great online experience for your users. We can take you from ideation through development and into optimization. Building a website is often the start of a bigger journey including social media services, digital marketing, and staged growth. 
• Web Development
• WordPress Plugin Development
• WordPress Theme Development
• Website Support
• Web Consulting
Pixel Jar started in 2004. It grew out of the desire to be free to choose projects that challenge us, work with clients that inspire us, and support our communities.
We service clients all over the world and from all walks of business. We’re able to handle self-managed websites for local businesses who want to gain exposure and legitimacy by developing an online presence that represents their brand to large projects involving third-party integrations, large-scale multi-sites, and demanding media needs.
